thread.title: Cardi B and 2 Chainz Share Playlist Featuring Kodak Black, Migos & Bobby Shmurda
thread.title_full: Cardi B and 2 Chainz Share Playlist Featuring Kodak Black, Migos & Bobby Shmurda

author: Trevor Smith
title: Cardi B and 2 Chainz Share Playlist Featuring Kodak Black, Migos & Bobby Shmurda
text:
Home > Music > Cardi B and 2 Chainz Share Playlist Featuring Kodak Black, Migos & Bobby Shmurda Cardi B and 2 Chainz Share Playlist Featuring Kodak Black, Migos & Bobby Shmurda 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Mar 5, 2017 at 06:40pm Future, Blac Youngsta, and Uncle Murda also appear. 
In advance of 2 Chainz' Pretty Girls Like Trap Music album, the Atlanta rapper has been tasking a few women in the industry to share their favorite trap cuts for a weekly playlist series. Following selections from Erykah Badu , Amber Rose , and Karrueche Tran, the one and only Cardi B has been tapped for this week's mix, and it's another solid curation. A post shared by 2 Chainz Aka Tity Boi (@hairweavekiller) on Mar 3, 2017 at 7:48am PST 
From the looks of things, Cardi B made sure to include a few artists from New York (Casanova, Uncle Murda, Bobby Shmurda ), and seems to be a big fan of both Migos (she's reportedly dating Offset) and Kodak Black , who each appear more than once. Also included in the playlist are Future, Blac Youngsta, and 21 Savage , as well as tracks from 2 Chainz and Cardi herself. 
Listen to Erykah Badu's playlist here .
